column4: hey ubuntu's, i need help installing distribution version 10.04 onto a Toshiba Sattelite and i am having a realy hard time.
it currently runs windows xp, and i have tried 3 times to install it through the cd
I have one of those, what's the issue?
That's the options screen. It should automagically try to boot from that, but if it isn't that suggests there's some underlying issues.
It's the value given to the CD image which proves it's correctly downloaded.
That is actually what I asked. Hm.
I am really not sure what to tell you.
i have some more information for my situation
on the permission denied window, it asked me to look at that file.
Yeah. Do you have any idea where the important lines are?
This looks VERY relevant to you: http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-1134058.html
so it looks like WUBI isn't good for this computer?
I would think not, but it seems you can't boot from the CD directly, which eliminates the other option.
Sorry, things went to hell for a minute. You need anything?
